title: His Majesties second message to the Parliament, concerning Sir Iohn Hothams refusall to give His Majestie entrance into his town of Hull.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill,
notes: With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Bodleian Library (Early English books).
